info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 7:15PM MDT until August 08 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MDT FOR SOUTHERN YUMA COUNTY... At 714 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles west of Bonny Reservoir, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bonny Reservoir, Hale, Kirk and Idalia. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 207 and 210, and between mile markers 212 and 231. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
